actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The einherjar makes two Battleaxe attacks, or it makes three Celestial Bolt attacks. It can replace one attack with Celestial Blessing, if available.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Celestial Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d8 + 2) radiant damage.

actions.name: Celestial Blessing (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The einherjar calls on its celestial patrons for one of the following blessings:

special_abilities.name: Battle Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The einherjar has advantage on all attack rolls it makes while it is below 30 hp.

special_abilities.name: Fearsome Gaze
special_abilities.desc: The stare of an einherjar is especially piercing to Humanoids. It has advantage on any Charisma (Intimidation) check it makes against a Humanoid.

special_abilities.name: Runic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The einherjar's weapon attacks are magical. When the einherjar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).
